xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
rendering.macro.chartjs.name=ChartJS rendering.macro.chartjs.description=Simple HTML5 charts using the canvas element. rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.type.name=Type rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.type.description=The type of chart. Choose from: line, bar, radar, pie, doughnut, polarArea, bubble, scatter. rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.options.name=Options rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.options.description=Advanced options specified as JSON. Checkout the Chart.js documentation for the available configuration options.
rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.name=Table to ChartJS rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.description=Draws a chart using ChartJS and the data read from a table. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.type.name=Type rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.type.description=The type of chart. Choose from: line, bar, radar, pie, doughnut, polarArea, bubble, scatter. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.options.name=Options rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.options.description=Advanced chart options specified as JSON. Checkout the Chart.js documentation for the available configuration options. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.table.name=Table rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.table.description=Identifies the source table. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.multipleDataSets.name=Multiple Data Sets rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.multipleDataSets.description=Whether the specified table includes multiple data sets. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.dataSetLabel.name=Data Set Label rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.dataSetLabel.description=The index of the table column that represents the data set label.
